title: Lolth (SLASH'EM)

| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Sleep             |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                   |
| Lolth:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is an [elf](/wiki/Elf_\(monster_attribute\) "Elf (monster attribute)").
* is female.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* hits creatures as a +4 weapon. |                   |

Lolth was the [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader") for the defunct [Drow quest](/wiki/Drow_quest "Drow quest") in SLASH'EM, in which she also replaced Erevan Ilesere as the [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") deity for the Elf pantheon.
html:
Lolth (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Lolth
s Lolth
Difficulty 20
Attacks Bite 5d8 (poison)
s Lolth
Difficulty 20
Attacks

Bite 5d8 (poison)

Speed 15
Base AC 0
Base MR 50
Alignment -20 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size Medium
Resistances Sleep
Resistances conveyed Sleep

Lolth:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is an elf.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • hits creatures as a +4 weapon.

Lolth was the quest leader for the defunct Drow quest in SLASH'EM, in which she also replaced Erevan Ilesere as the chaotic deity for the Elf pantheon.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Lolth_(SLASH%27EM)&oldid=166794"

Lolth was the [[quest leader]] for the defunct [[Drow quest]] in SLASH'EM, in which she also replaced Erevan Ilesere as the [[chaotic]] deity for the Elf pantheon.
